$Frozen Dragon Monument$
Though nobody in this world knows about the Frozen Dragon, there is a space on the monument for it with the names and achievements of heroes who defeated the dragon.

$Frozen Dragon Monument$
Frozen Dragon Monument shines in bright light and {user_nick}'s achievement is engraved in shining letters. Although no one in this world will be able to see these words, your achievement will be etched in the memories of the people in another world.
